description: MOM (2017) 1CD 480p x264 Screenshots : http://postimage.xyz/image/Kn18 http://postimage.xyz/image/K0un http://postimage.xyz/image/K2rW http://postimage.xyz/image/K6SB http://postimage.xyz/image/KfFZ MOM (2017) Storyline A tale of how far a mother will go for the sake of her children. God could not be everywhere, so he created MOM. Devki, a loving wife and mother of two beautiful daughters seemingly has a perfect happy family, yet somehow true happiness of being a mother eludes her. Arya, a sensitive girl, believes a daughter comes into a mother's life, but a mother does not enter that of a daughter. Devki patiently waits for Arya's love and acceptance as she believes only a mother can truly understand the silence of her child. An unfortunate incident widens the distance between Arya and Devki, to a point of no return. In such a situation a mother has to make a choice 'not between' what is wrong or right', but between 'what is wrong and very wrong.” MOM is the story of what will a mother do in such a situation. Will she fight for her daughter's love knowing the consequences she may have to face? Release date: July 7, 2017 (USA) Director: Ravi Udyawar Music composed by: A. R. Rahman Dont forget to seed
